definition: to attend court/to take part in a trial
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages

sentences.english: A decision on whether the high court will hear the case is pending.
sentences.chinese: 對於是否由高級法院聽審這個案件的決定尚未作出。

sentences.english: Najafi and Adams attended Sunday's hearing, but did not speak.
sentences.chinese: 納傑菲和亞當斯於上週日出庭聽審，但沒有發言。

sentences.english: It was not indicated when the deposition might take place.
sentences.chinese: 沒有任何文件說明聽審將於何時舉行。
